tp.pr5.console

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.console.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InventoryObserver, NavigationObserver, RobotEngineObserver

    public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
implements NavigationObserver, RobotEngineObserver, InventoryObserver
    The view that displays the application on the System.out. It implements all the observer interfaces in order to be notified about every event that occur when the robot is running.
